metadata.Title: CVE-2009-2166 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Absolute path traversal vulnerability in cvs.php in OCS Inventory NG before1.02.1 on Unix allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a fullpathname in the log parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-2166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.0.5-1.1
ocsinventory-server - 2.0.5-1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1.1').
